casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dane LOCKLEAR, Jr. No. 578A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2005. William P. Hart, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of December 2005 by Defendant to Extend Time to Prepare Transcript:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 2nd day of February 2006 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel. By order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of December 2005."
